options.description: The block of options for the tracker.

interval.description:
The time, in minutes, between each of the pop-up boxes.

Positive whole numbers only.

keep-awake.description:
Whether to keep the screen awake while the application is running.

Values of `true` or `false` only.

run-on-startup.description:
Whether the tracker should start running when the application is initialised.

Values of `true` or `false` only.

show-last-n-weeks.description:
The number of weeks to look historically for drop-down entries.

Non-negative whole numbers only.

save-csv-copy.description:
Whether the tracker should save a copy of the full history to a CSV file.

If `true`, then the `csv-filepath` property must be given an absolute filepath of the *directory* to save the file to.

Values of `true` or `false` only.

csv-filepath.description: The absolute filepath of the *directory* to save a CSV copy of the full history to. This will not be used unless the `save-csv-copy` property is set to `true`.

linked-calendar.description:
The calendar to sync with for meeting defaults.

Values of `none`, `outlook`, or `google` only.

appointment-category-exclusions.description:
The categories to exclude when filling the form with details from the linked calendar.

Values must be a list of strings. The available values should be synced from the linked calendar.

github-issues-search.description:
The issue search term to filter by.

See below for more details:

https://docs.github.com/en/search-github/searching-on-github/searching-issues-and-pull-requests

jira-type.description:
The Jira platform to connect to.

Only Cloud is supported, and this is to emphasise this.

jira-filter.description: The Jira filter to use for filling the form with tasks

post-to-jira.description:
Whether the tracker should update the linked Jira ticket with a worklog.

Values of `true` or `false` only.

post-to-slack.description:
Whether the tracker should post a message with the entered pop-up values to a Slack channel.

Values of `true` or `false` only.

monday-filter.description: The GraphQL request to select the items to use for filling the form with tasks.
